noun.description: A light ringing sound such as that made by metal objects being shaken together.
A short slogan, verse, or tune designed to be easily remembered, especially as used in advertising.
A bivalve mollusk with a fragile, slightly translucent shell, the lower valve of which has a hole through which pass byssus threads for anchorage.

verb.description: Make or cause to make a light metallic ringing sound.
examples: he jingled the coins in his pocket
